mapper.sql: a.id, a.user_id, a.start_date, a.end_date, a.practice_name, a.remarks
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM sys_practice_experience a
WHERE a.user_id = #{user.id} ORDER BY a.end_date
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_practice_experience( id, user_id, start_date, end_date, practice_name, remarks )VALUES( #{id}, #{user.id}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{practiceName}, #{remarks} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_practice_experience SET id = #{id}, user_id = #{user.id}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, practice_name = #{practiceName}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
